title: Man ‘held knife to mother’s throat’
content: A BAHRAINI man who stabbed his father to death while he was high had also held his mother at knife-point, it has emerged. Last October the 31-year-old became violent after sniffing an aerosol cleaning product called Stop and plunged a knife twice into his own father at their home in Muharraq .  You Might Like
